subject: Re: New to the group
author: Misty
full_text:
Hi Brian welcome to the group.

ITC stands for "instrumental transcommunication" which now covers a 
broad spectrum of the work being done here including EVP.

To get an idea of how the box can work you could try manual sweep 
until you get a box running. Its very easy to do.

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Brian Watts <ghostly_rider1@...> 
wrote:
>
> Hello everyone
> 
> My name is Brian and I just joined the group to better understand 
how the box works. I know it's a subject that has been in the 
paranormal community for some time now. They are a lot that don't 
believe in the box and think that it's a lot of hogwash. All I can 
say is that people thought, that the Wright Brothers where crazy to 
think they could fly,  and where are we today! So I look at the box 
as a possibility and would like to better understand how this box may 
work.
> 
> One of my first questions is, what does ITC stand for?
> 
> I know what EVP stands for (Electronic Voice Phenomenon). 
> 
> I am not a paranormal researcher nor do I belong to any ghost 
hunting/research group but, I do have a strong interest in it. My 
wife and I will go out at times to graveyards and/or place looking 
for paranormal activity. We did get some EVPs at once with a digital 
recorder.
> 
> Thank you,
> ~Brian
>
